meta.name: Yubico
meta.about: Yubico sets new world standards for simple, secure login, preventing unauthorized access to computers, servers and internet accounts.

meta.name: Yubico
meta.about: As the inventors of the YubiKey, Yubico sets new world standards for secure login across the Internet. Our unique USB and NFC key offers one-touch strong authentication supporting multiple authentication protocols for all devices and platforms â€“ with no driver or client software needed. With successful enterprise deployments in 160 countries, including 9 of the top 10 Internet companies, Yubico is adding the consumer market to its list of strong authentication converts. Founded in 2007, Yubico is privately held with offices in Palo Alto, Calif., Seattle, Wa., Stockholm, and London.
